query.statement:
SELECT X.*, CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN Y.CD_NM WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'fr' THEN Y.CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'de' THEN Y.CD_NM_DEU WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'it' THEN Y.CD_NM_ITA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'es' THEN Y.CD_NM_ESP ELSE Y.CD_NM_ENG END AS RD_TRGT1_NM, CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN Z.CD_NM WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'fr' THEN Z.CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'de' THEN Z.CD_NM_DEU WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'it' THEN Z.CD_NM_ITA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'es' THEN Z.CD_NM_ESP ELSE Z.CD_NM_ENG END AS RD_TRGT2_NM FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum RN, t.*, COUNT(1) over() TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT SEQNO, TITLE, CONT, RDCNT, RD_TRGT1, RD_TRGT2 , CASE WHEN ANNCE_STARTDAY = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE ANNCE_STARTDAY END ANNCE_STARTDAY , CASE WHEN ANNCE_ENDDAY = '99999999' THEN '' ELSE ANNCE_ENDDAY END ANNCE_ENDDAY , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REGDT, REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM, REGMAN_JIKGUP_NM, REG_DEPT_NM , CASE WHEN REG_DT > SYSDATE-56 THEN 'NEW' ELSE '' END NEW_YN FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE WHERE SEQNO IN (SELECT SEQNO FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND ANNCE_GBN = 'C01301' AND RD_TRGT1 = 'C01601' #if(!$vo.manager_yn.equals("Y")) AND RD_TRGT2 = 'C05701' #end AND ANNCE_STARTDAY < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ANNCE_ENDDAY > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
UNION
SELECT SEQNO FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND ANNCE_GBN = 'C01301' #if(!$vo.manager_yn.equals("Y")) AND RD_TRGT2 = 'C05701' #end AND RD_TRGT1 = 'C01602' AND SEQNO IN (SELECT DISTINCT SEQNO FROM TN_CLM_ANNCE_TRGTORGNZ WHERE ORGNZ_CD = :vo.session_blngt_orgnz) AND ANNCE_STARTDAY < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ANNCE_ENDDAY > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ) #if (!$vo.srch_keyword_content.equals("")) #if($vo.srch_keyword.equals("title")) AND UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_keyword_content + '%' #elseif($vo.srch_keyword.equals("reg_nm")) AND UPPER(REG_NM) LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_keyword_content + '%' #else AND UPPER(CONT) LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_keyword_content + '%' #end #end #if(!$vo.srch_start_dt.equals("")) AND TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') >= :vo.srch_start_dt #end #if(!$vo.srch_end_dt.equals("")) AND TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') <= :vo.srch_end_dt #end ORDER BY REG_DT DESC, SEQNO DESC ) t ) WHERE RN between :vo.start_index and :vo.end_index ) X, TB_COM_CD Y, TB_COM_CD Z WHERE Y.SYS_CD = 'CLM' AND Y.GRP_CD = 'C016' AND X.RD_TRGT1 = Y.CD AND Z.SYS_CD = 'CLM' AND Z.GRP_CD = 'C057' AND X.RD_TRGT2 = Z.CD ORDER BY X.RN

SELECT MASTER.*, TO_CHAR(DETAIL1.ORG_NM) AS ORGNZ_NM, DETAIL2.ORGNZ_NMS FROM ( SELECT X.*, CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN Y.CD_NM WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'fr' THEN Y.CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'de' THEN Y.CD_NM_DEU WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'it' THEN Y.CD_NM_ITA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'es' THEN Y.CD_NM_ESP ELSE Y.CD_NM_ENG END AS RD_TRGT1_NM, CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN Z.CD_NM WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'fr' THEN Z.CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'de' THEN Z.CD_NM_DEU WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'it' THEN Z.CD_NM_ITA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'es' THEN Z.CD_NM_ESP ELSE Z.CD_NM_ENG END AS RD_TRGT2_NM FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum RN, t.*, COUNT(1) over() TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT SEQNO, TITLE, TITLE_EN, CONT, CONT_EN, RDCNT, RD_TRGT1, RD_TRGT2, SEC_YN , CASE WHEN ANNCE_STARTDAY = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE ANNCE_STARTDAY END ANNCE_STARTDAY , CASE WHEN ANNCE_ENDDAY = '99999999' THEN '' ELSE ANNCE_ENDDAY END ANNCE_ENDDAY , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REGDT, REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM, REGMAN_JIKGUP_NM, REG_DEPT_NM , CASE WHEN REG_DT > SYSDATE-56 THEN 'NEW' ELSE '' END NEW_YN FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND ANNCE_GBN = 'C01301' #if (!$vo.srch_keyword_content.equals("")) #if($vo.srch_keyword.equals("title")) AND UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_keyword_content + '%' #elseif($vo.srch_keyword.equals("reg_nm")) AND UPPER(REG_NM) LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_keyword_content + '%' #else AND UPPER(CONT) LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_keyword_content + '%' #end #end #if(!$vo.srch_start_dt.equals("")) AND TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') >= :vo.srch_start_dt #end #if(!$vo.srch_end_dt.equals("")) AND TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') <= :vo.srch_end_dt #end ORDER BY REG_DT DESC, SEQNO DESC ) t ) WHERE RN between :vo.start_index and :vo.end_index ) X, TB_COM_CD Y, TB_COM_CD Z WHERE Y.SYS_CD = 'CLM' AND Y.GRP_CD = 'C016' AND X.RD_TRGT1 = Y.CD AND Z.SYS_CD = 'CLM' AND Z.GRP_CD = 'C057' AND X.RD_TRGT2 = Z.CD ) MASTER, ( SELECT M.SEQNO, CASE WHEN M.ORGNZ_CNT > 1 THEN CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN D.ORGNZ_NM + ' 외 ' + TO_CHAR(M.ORGNZ_CNT - 1) + '개' ELSE D.ORGNZ_NM_ENG + ' and ' + TO_CHAR(M.ORGNZ_CNT - 1) + ' others' END ELSE CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN ISNULL(D.ORGNZ_NM, '') ELSE ISNULL(D.ORGNZ_NM_ENG, '') END END AS ORG_NM FROM ( SELECT SEQNO, MIN(ORGNZ_CD) AS ORGNZ_CD, COUNT(ORGNZ_CD) AS ORGNZ_CNT FROM TN_CLM_ANNCE_TRGTORGNZ GROUP BY SEQNO ) M, TN_CLM_UNITORGNZ D WHERE M.ORGNZ_CD = D.ORGNZ_CD AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' ) DETAIL1, ( SELECT SEQNO, SUBSTRING(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ORGNZ_NM, ', ')), 2) AS ORGNZ_NMS FROM ( SELECT O.SEQNO, P.ORGNZ_NM, row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY O.SEQNO ORDER BY P.ORGNZ_NM ) AS rn FROM TN_CLM_ANNCE_TRGTORGNZ O, TN_CLM_UNITORGNZ P WHERE O.ORGNZ_CD = P.ORGNZ_CD ) START WITH rn = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR rn = rn - 1 AND PRIOR SEQNO = SEQNO GROUP BY SEQNO ) DETAIL2 WHERE MASTER.SEQNO = DETAIL1.SEQNO(+) AND MASTER.SEQNO = DETAIL2.SEQNO(+) ORDER BY MASTER.RN

INSERT INTO TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE ( SEQNO , ANNCE_GBN , TITLE , TITLE_EN , CONT , CONT_EN , RD_TRGT1 , RD_TRGT2 , SEC_YN , ANNCE_STARTDAY , ANNCE_ENDDAY , REG_DT , REG_ID , REG_NM , REGMAN_JIKGUP_NM , REG_DEPT_NM , DEL_YN ) VALUES ( :vo.seqno ,'C01301' ,:vo.title ,:vo.title_en ,:vo.cont ,:vo.cont_en ,:vo.rd_trgt1 ,:vo.rd_trgt2 ,:vo.sec_yn ,:vo.annce_startday ,:vo.annce_endday ,SYSDATE ,:vo.reg_id ,:vo.reg_nm ,:vo.regman_jikgup_nm ,:vo.reg_dept_nm ,'N' )
SELECT A.SEQNO, A.ORGNZ_CD, B.ORGNZ_NM FROM TN_CLM_ANNCE_TRGTORGNZ A, TN_CLM_UNITORGNZ B WHERE A.ORGNZ_CD = B.ORGNZ_CD AND A.SEQNO = :vo.seqno
SELECT MAX(SEQNO) AS MAX_SEQ_NO FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE

SELECT A.*, CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN B.CD_NM WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'fr' THEN B.CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'de' THEN B.CD_NM_DEU WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'it' THEN B.CD_NM_ITA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'es' THEN B.CD_NM_ESP ELSE B.CD_NM_ENG END AS RD_TRGT1_NM, CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN C.CD_NM WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'fr' THEN C.CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'de' THEN C.CD_NM_DEU WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'it' THEN C.CD_NM_ITA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'es' THEN C.CD_NM_ESP ELSE C.CD_NM_ENG END AS RD_TRGT2_NM FROM ( SELECT SEQNO ,TITLE ,TITLE_EN ,CONT ,ISNULL(CONT_EN, ' ') CONT_EN ,RDCNT ,RD_TRGT1 ,RD_TRGT2 , CASE WHEN ANNCE_STARTDAY = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE ANNCE_STARTDAY END ANNCE_STARTDAY , CASE WHEN ANNCE_ENDDAY = '99999999' THEN '' ELSE ANNCE_ENDDAY END ANNCE_ENDDAY , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_DT ,REG_ID ,REG_NM ,REGMAN_JIKGUP_NM ,REG_DEPT_NM ,SEC_YN FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE WHERE SEQNO = :vo.seqno AND ANNCE_GBN = 'C01301' AND DEL_YN ='N' ) A, TB_COM_CD B, TB_COM_CD C WHERE B.SYS_CD = 'CLM' AND B.GRP_CD = 'C016' AND A.RD_TRGT1 = B.CD AND C.SYS_CD = 'CLM' AND C.GRP_CD = 'C057' AND A.RD_TRGT2 = C.CD
UPDATE TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE SET RDCNT = RDCNT + 1 WHERE SEQNO = :vo.seqno AND DEL_YN = 'N'

UPDATE TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE SET TITLE = :vo.title , TITLE_EN = :vo.title_en , CONT = :vo.cont , CONT_EN = :vo.cont_en , RD_TRGT1 = :vo.rd_trgt1 , RD_TRGT2 = :vo.rd_trgt2 , ANNCE_STARTDAY = :vo.annce_startday , ANNCE_ENDDAY = :vo.annce_endday , SEC_YN = :vo.sec_yn , MOD_DT = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = :vo.mod_id , MOD_NM = :vo.mod_nm WHERE SEQNO = :vo.seqno
UPDATE TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , DEL_ID = :vo.del_id , DEL_DT = SYSDATE , DEL_NM = :vo.del_nm WHERE SEQNO = :vo.seqno

SELECT SEQNO, ANNCE_GBN, TITLE, CONT_TYPE, CONT, RDCNT, ANNCE_STARTDAY, ANNCE_ENDDAY, RD_TRGT1, RD_TRGT2, REGMAN_JIKGUP_NM ,REG_DEPT_NM, REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_NM, DEL_YN, DEL_DT, DEL_ID, DEL_NM FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE WHERE SEQNO = :vo.seqno AND (DEL_YN IS NULL OR DEL_YN ='N')

SELECT X.*, CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN Y.CD_NM WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'fr' THEN Y.CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'de' THEN Y.CD_NM_DEU WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'it' THEN Y.CD_NM_ITA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'es' THEN Y.CD_NM_ESP ELSE Y.CD_NM_ENG END AS RD_TRGT1_NM, CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'ko' THEN Z.CD_NM WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'fr' THEN Z.CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'de' THEN Z.CD_NM_DEU WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'it' THEN Z.CD_NM_ITA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale = 'es' THEN Z.CD_NM_ESP ELSE Z.CD_NM_ENG END AS RD_TRGT2_NM FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum RN, t.*, COUNT(1) over() TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT SEQNO, TITLE, TITLE_EN, CONT, CONT_EN, RDCNT, RD_TRGT1, RD_TRGT2 , CASE WHEN ANNCE_STARTDAY = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE ANNCE_STARTDAY END ANNCE_STARTDAY , CASE WHEN ANNCE_ENDDAY = '99999999' THEN '' ELSE ANNCE_ENDDAY END ANNCE_ENDDAY , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REGDT, REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM, REGMAN_JIKGUP_NM, REG_DEPT_NM , CASE WHEN REG_DT > SYSDATE-56 THEN 'NEW' ELSE '' END NEW_YN FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE WHERE SEQNO IN (SELECT SEQNO FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND ANNCE_GBN = 'C01301' AND RD_TRGT1 = 'C01601' #if(!$vo.manager_yn.equals("Y")) AND RD_TRGT2 = 'C05701' #end AND ANNCE_STARTDAY < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ANNCE_ENDDAY > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
UNION
SELECT SEQNO FROM TN_CLM_ANNOUNCE WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND ANNCE_GBN = 'C01301' #if(!$vo.manager_yn.equals("Y")) AND RD_TRGT2 = 'C05701' #end AND RD_TRGT1 = 'C01602' AND SEQNO IN (SELECT DISTINCT SEQNO FROM TN_CLM_ANNCE_TRGTORGNZ WHERE ORGNZ_CD = :vo.session_blngt_orgnz) AND ANNCE_STARTDAY < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ANNCE_ENDDAY > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ) ORDER BY REG_DT DESC, SEQNO DESC ) t ) WHERE RN between :vo.start_index and :vo.end_index ) X, TB_COM_CD Y, TB_COM_CD Z WHERE Y.SYS_CD = 'CLM' AND Y.GRP_CD = 'C016' AND X.RD_TRGT1 = Y.CD AND Z.SYS_CD = 'CLM' AND Z.GRP_CD = 'C057' AND X.RD_TRGT2 = Z.CD
